clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Compare PK and Safety of CKD-381 and D026 in Healthy Male Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Multiple-dose, and Three-way Crossover Clinical Trial to Compare Pharmacokinetics and Safety of CKD-381 and D026 in Healthy Male Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: A Study to compare pharmacokinetics and safety of CKD-381 and D026 in healthy male subjects

detailed_description.textblock: A randomized, open-label, multiple-dose, and three-way cross over clinical trial to compare pharmacokinetics and safety of CKD-381 and D026 in healthy male subjects

primary_outcome.measure: AUCtau,ss(Area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve within a dosing interval at steady state)
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK esomeprazole after multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax,ss(Maximum concentration of drug in plasma at steady state)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK esomeprazole after multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax,ss(Time to maximum plasma concentration at steady state)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK esomeprazole after multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Vss/F(Apparent Volume of distribution at steady state)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK esomeprazole after multiple dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax(Maximum concentration of drug in plasma)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK esomeprazole after single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: AUClast(Area under the plasma drug concentration-time curve from 0 to last)
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation PK esomeprazole after single dose

arm_group.description: Period 1: Test drug(CKD-381 formulation I), Period 2: Test drug(CKD-381 formulation II), Period 3: Reference drug(D026)
Period 1: Test drug(CKD-381 formulation II), Period 2: Reference drug(D026), Period 3: Test drug(CKD-381 formulation I)
Period 1: Reference drug(D026), Period 2: Test drug(CKD-381 formulation I), Period 3: Test drug(CKD-381 formulation II)

intervention.description: 1 tablet administered before the breakfast during 7 days
1 tablet administered before the breakfast during 7 days
1 tablet administered before the breakfast during 7 days

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Between 19 aged and 50 aged in healthy male adult
2. Body weight more than 55kg
3. Body Mass Index more than 18.5 and under 25
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Have clinically significant disease that hepatobiliary system, kidney, nervous system, immune system, respiratory system, endocrine system, hemato-oncology disease, cardiovascular system or mental illness, or a history of mental disease.
2. Have a gastrointestinal disease history that can effect drug absorption or surgery.
3. Hypersensitivity reaction or clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction in the history of Esomeprazole, additives or benzimidazole family.

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Clinical Pharmacology and Therapeutics, Seoul National University College of Medicine and Hospital
